rules_text:
Create a 2/2 green Lizard Horror creature token with reach. Populate twice. [i](Create a token that’s a copy of a creature token you control. Repeat this process once.)[/i]
[i]Otherworld[/i] – As long as an opponent has been burdened three or more times and this sorcery is in your graveyard, it has flashback {5}{W}{W} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)[/i]
